item.title: CIFAR-10 CNN Classification Practice
item.description:
ðŸ“Œ This project is a continuation of MODWT Time Series Transformation and Visualization, shifting from statistical signal processing to deep learning model experimentation.

ðŸ”— SERIES

  • 1. Quantile Correlation Analysis Tool Implementation
  • 2. MODWT-Based Time Series Transformation and Visualization
  • 3. CIFAR-10 CNN Classification Practice
  • 4. Altcoin Price Prediction Based on WQC Image Analysis

SUMMARY

A mini research project following “MODWT-Based Time Series Transformation and Visualization”, conducted as part of an undergraduate research initiative.
This project involved studying Chapter 11 of Understanding Deep Learningand implementing a basic CNN for CIFAR-10 classification to build hands-on understanding of deep learning principles.
